title: Etherscan Contract validation error

body:
Hello. 
In the flattened version, the pragma is defined on several lines. It must be defined on a single line. That is why it may be giving the error you commented. 
Once the pragma issue is resolved, you should move the IERC20 interface a few lines higher than the IERC20Metadata interface. 
The link of the contract verified on the blockchain ropsten:
https://ropsten.etherscan.io/address/0xD4548Fc2cB18A1127eef9c2Ed03D9763e7fB0f5b#code

Refer to our guide [How to verify a contract on Etherscan/BscScan/PolygonScan](https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/how-to-verify-a-contract-on-etherscan-bscscan-polygonscan/14225).

Support requests should go on our forum and not in these issues.
